Articles.Content:
Do you think it would be easier to build the rockets in real life or Realism Overhaul?

To be honest? Real life! Just kidding. RO is an altogether different animal from what I've grown waaaay too comfortable with in KSP, but when I look at the CMEO, I see the building blocks for a bonafide real world space program, and feel it would make a perfect fit in RO. I just wish I knew my way around config files and whatnot to try to help make it happen myself.

HI all

Can some one share confi

g whit corect nodes and sizes ro/rss for rhis mod after i insteled when load some presafed rockets they are messed up.

Im using Chaka Monkey with TAC LS and the resources aren't popping up like they should, this is weird because I was previously able to do this a patch or two ago. Would this be a change in chaka or TAC and what should I do to fix it?
Does anyone know what happened to the new thread? As of right now, the latest version I can get is the beta test off of Curse forge.

Here's the Release Thread with the newest Infos.

Yanfret is working on it.
KSP freezes on loading due to the a specific part (Orion_LES to exact). I can load the game if i delete it but i would love to use it
